data_sources: distill_profiles.json (97 profiles researched via Distill MCP)
metadata.methodology_note: Analysis based on partial LinkedIn connection captures enriched with Distill research for deeptech classification. _I columns = inferred from titles, _D columns = Distill-verified. LinkedIn connections are one signal of relationship depth, but absence of connection does not prove absence of relationship.

prod_validation.founders_searched: Michael Truell, Sualeh Asif, Aman Sanger, Arvid Lunnemark
Brendan Foody, Adarsh Hiremath, Surya Midha
Scott Wu, Steven Hao, Walden Yan

harvard.assessment: 🚩 Red Flag: Zero LinkedIn connections to Prod accelerator flagship founders (Cursor, Mercor, Cognition) despite claiming 'Prod accelerator access.' Harvard network is real (603 connections) but skews toward operators (67%). Filter CSV by Category_I to see full breakdown.

vcpe.tier1_firms: a16z, Sequoia, Founders Fund, Benchmark, Greylock, Kleiner, Accel, NEA, Bessemer, General Catalyst
vcpe.assessment: âœ… Verified: Strong VC network with 19% GP-level (General Partner, Managing Director) and 39% partner-level connections.

deeptech.assessment: ðŸŸ¡ Mixed: 6 quantum connections in deeptech facet, 9 total network-wide (Biercuk/Q-CTRL, Khan/Quantinuum, Cimaglia/Quantum Coast, Camirand Lemyre/Nord Quantique, etc.). Distill research identified 25 high-relevance deeptech profiles. Network is ~70% generalist. Filter by Ecosystem_D (Distill-verified) or Ecosystem_I (inferred).

strategic_relationships.dataroom_context: Dataroom claims: 'Filtered deal flow to 8VC, a16z, Lowercarbon, Toyota Ventures' (Central Hub). 'Collaborators with 14 early-stage deeptech VCs' + 'partnerships with 40+ generalist VCs across tiers'. Pitch deck page 10 shows 24 VC logos as 'Trusted Relationships'.

strengths.description: Strong Harvard alumni network with 603 connections across investors, founders, and operators
strengths.significance: Supports 'Youngest Harvard-led GP' positioning and provides deal flow source

strengths.description: Broad early-stage VC network spanning 267 unique firms
strengths.evidence: 395 total early-stage VC connections across 267 firms
strengths.significance: Supports 'partnerships with 40+ VCs' claim if partner-level relationships exist

gaps.description: Limited quantum network (9 connections) despite claim of '120+ founders contacted, 23 calls'
gaps.evidence: 9 quantum-related connections (Distill-verified): Biercuk/Q-CTRL, Khan/Quantinuum, Cimaglia/Quantum Coast, Camirand Lemyre/Nord Quantique, Laughlin/Atom Computing, Manaloto/Qubits Ventures, Jackson/Quantinuum, Machnes, Rodriguez Rosario
gaps.significance: Gap between claimed '120+ quantum founders contacted' and 9 LinkedIn connections. However, quality is strong - includes founders of Q-CTRL, Quantinuum, Nord Quantique. LinkedIn capture may be incomplete.

gaps.description: Network heavily skewed toward generalists (85.1%) vs deeptech (4.9%)
gaps.evidence: 85.1% generalist, 4.9% deeptech (quantum 0.7% + fusion 1.3% + robotics 1.1% + biotech 1.5% + nuclear 0.1% + climate 0.2%). Distill research identified 25 high-relevance deeptech profiles.
gaps.significance: Network composition doesn't strongly support 'deeptech specialist' positioning. However, 25 high-relevance deeptech profiles (Distill-verified) includes quality connections in quantum, nuclear, and AI infrastructure.

gaps.description: Partner-level connections represent 18.3% of network - need to verify depth of '40+ VC partnerships'
gaps.significance: Claim of '40+ VC partnerships' needs verification - are these true partner relationships or broader network?

verification_priorities.current_evidence: 9 LinkedIn connections in quantum (Distill-verified): Biercuk/Q-CTRL, Khan/Quantinuum, Cimaglia/Quantum Coast, Camirand Lemyre/Nord Quantique, Laughlin/Atom Computing, Manaloto/Qubits Ventures, etc.
verification_priorities.verification_approach: Reference checks with portfolio companies (Quantinuum, aqora). Note: quality of quantum connections is strong (multiple founders), but quantity gap vs '120+ contacted' claim remains. LinkedIn capture may be incomplete.
verification_priorities.rationale: Gap reduced from critical to high. Quality connections verified (Q-CTRL, Quantinuum, Nord Quantique founders), but quantity claim still needs validation.

verification_priorities.relationship_claimed: Partnerships with 40+ generalist VCs across tiers
verification_priorities.current_evidence: 267 unique VC firms with connections, 310 partner-level
verification_priorities.verification_approach: Define 'partnership' - co-investment? Deal sharing? Reference checks? Count unique firms with 2+ partner connections.
verification_priorities.rationale: Need to validate whether these are true partnerships (mutual deal flow) or broader network acquaintances.

verification_priorities.verification_approach: Reference checks with 12 founder testimonials - how did they meet? Who referred them? Verify 'passive referral' claim.
verification_priorities.rationale: Core of sourcing thesis. Need to validate passive vs active sourcing and referral flywheel existence.

key_findings.synthesis: Network composition suggests **generalist VC with emerging deeptech focus** rather than established deeptech specialist. Key findings after Distill enrichment: (1) Zero Prod founder connections despite claiming accelerator access remains a gap, (2) 9 quantum connections verified (upgraded from 8) with strong quality - includes founders of Q-CTRL, Quantinuum, Nord Quantique - but quantity gap vs '120+ contacted' claim persists, (3) 85% generalist network vs deeptech positioning, though 25 high-relevance deeptech profiles identified. VC network breadth (18.3% partner-level, 52 tier-1 connections) is a verified strength.
key_findings.next_steps: Verify quantum network claims through reference checks with portfolio companies. Note that LinkedIn capture may be incomplete - quality of quantum connections is strong even if quantity is limited. Define 'partnership' criteria for VC relationship count.
key_findings.distill_enrichment_note: 97 profiles researched via Distill MCP, 81 matched to CSV, 25 high-relevance deeptech identified. Ecosystems now include Distill-verified nuclear, climate_tech, and defense categories.

top_firms_note: Calculated from combined_deduped.csv (unique connections per firm, schools excluded)
